content: P Universal diamond blade Diamond blade for cutting in different base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features High cutting speed with a random diamond distribution on each segment Designed for universality on a wide range of materials Thick steel core for maximum reliability and safety Applications Cutting, resizing and reshaping a wide range of mineral construction materials, especially masonry, natural stone, concrete, roof and floor tiles, etc. For use with all Hilti hand-held diamond cutting tools including angle grinders, electric cutters and gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Angle grinder, Gas saw Base material: Masonry, Natural stone, Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) Product Class: Standard Technical Data | Tool type | Angle grinder, Gas saw | Base material | Masonry, Natural stone, Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) | Product Class | Standard | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry ### ITEMS- 2331218 - Dia blade 4x5/8-7/8 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2331219 - Dia blade 4x5/8-7/8 (6) P univ - Package Size 6 pc - 2331220 - Dia blade 4.5x5/8-7/8 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2331221 - Dia blade 4.5x5/8-7/8 (6) P univ - Package Size 6 pc - 2331222 - Dia blade 5x5/8-7/8 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2331223 - Dia blade 5x5/8-7/8 (6) P univ - Package Size 6 pc - 2331226 - Dia blade 7x5/8-7/8-DM P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2331227 - Dia blade 7x5/8-7/8-DM (6) P univ - Package Size 6 pc - 2331228 - Dia blade 9x5/8-7/8 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2331229 - Dia blade 9x5/8-7/8 (6) P univ - Package Size 6 pc - 2169811 - Cutting disc 12x1 P univ - Package Size 1 pc - 2118763 - Cutting disc P-S 14/1 - Package Size 1 pc - 2118764 - Cutting disc P-S 16/1 - Package Size 1 pc
